hero-subtitle: Your brew. Your vintage. Your story.  Right Here In Squamish.
beer-text: We're expanding into craft beer. Soon you'll be able to brew your own pilsners, IPAs, stouts, and more—right here in our shop. Same hands-on experience, same expert guidance, a whole new world of flavour. Stay tuned for our full beer lineup.
uferment-text: U-Ferment is a service where you craft professional-grade wine, beer, or cider at a licensed facility. We provide the ingredients and equipment while handling the storage and technical monitoring of the fermentation process for you. It allows you to produce custom, high-quality beverages without the mess, space requirements, or daily maintenance of a home-brewing setup.
howitworks-text: You reserve a kit here or come into the store and pick from the inventory. You start the fermentation process with our assistance for your desired wine or wines (beer coming soon!) and we take it from there. We diligently tend to your batch, and we'll let you know when it is ready to come and package. You can bring your own bottles or purchase from a variety of packaging options in store. Then you take home your beverage to drink or age as you please!

promo-news.title: Grand Opening Special
promo-news.text: We're celebrating our grand opening with 15% off all wine kits through the end of January! Stop by to meet the team and start your first batch.

promo-news.title: Now Open in Squamish
promo-news.text: Steins & Vines is officially open for business. Book your first appointment online or drop in during our regular hours.
